data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Luzhou, Sichuan, China that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Luzhou, Sichuan, China.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 5,978 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Luzhou that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 5,978 believers in Luzhou to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Hmong Be people.
Please, teach the 5,978 believers in Luzhou, Sichuan, China how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Luzhou, Sichuan, China to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.section_summary:
the county of Luzhou, Sichuan, China has a population of 78,800.

We estimate Luzhou has 5,978 people who might know Jesus, 1,273 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 71,549 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

location.name: Luzhou
location.people_groups_list: Hmong Dou, Hmong Daw, Yizi, Miao, Horned, Nanjingren
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Hmong Dou (4,200), Hmong Daw (309,000), Yizi (3,000), Miao, Horned (85,000), Nanjingren (165,000)
